### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=-40.5, y=40.5) 

### Boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0)
Consists of boiler(position x=-24.5, y=32.0), offshore pump(position x=-16.5, y=26.5), and pipe group(fluid_system=515364)

### Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of boiler(position x=1.5, y=1.0), pipe group(fluid_system=515387), and small electric pole(position x=3.5, y=0.5)

### Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=3.0)
Consists of boiler(position x=1.5, y=3.0), pipe group(fluid_system=515387), and small electric pole(position x=3.5, y=2.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=-7.5, y=25.5) and pipe group(fluid_system=515471)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-18.5, y=27.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=-18.5, y=27.5) and pipe group(fluid_system=515473)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-3.5, y=27.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=-3.5, y=27.5) and pipe group(fluid_system=515364)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-1.5, y=28.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=-1.5, y=28.5) and pipe group(fluid_system=515364)

### Offshore pump at position(x=0.5, y=30.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=0.5, y=30.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=1.5, y=32.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=1.5, y=32.5)

### Electricity network
Consists of small electric pole(position x=-42.5, y=39.5), small electric pole(position x=3.5, y=0.5), small electric pole(position x=3.5, y=2.5), and electricity group(id=88363)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using connect_entities
- Ensure that the entities are not blocked by other entities before attempting to connect them.
- Make sure that the entities are in the correct positions and have the correct connections before attempting to connect them.

### Errors when using insert_item
- Make sure that the item to be inserted is in the inventory before attempting to insert it.
- Ensure that the entity has enough space to hold the item before attempting to insert it.

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure that the offshore pump is connected to a pipe group before attempting to use it.
- Make sure that the offshore pump has enough fluid to pump before attempting to use it.

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure that the boiler has enough fuel to operate before attempting to use it.
- Make sure that the boiler is connected to a pipe group before attempting to use it.
